ProdigyUpdated on 22 Sep 2019You can get a rough idea of how much it costs to get a degree in Singapore here:https://blog.seedly.sg/uni-degree-returns-on-investment/It also depends largely on your lifestyle -- so if you're frugal and don't spend on big-ticket things or take taxis, then the bulk of your cost would really be just the tuition fees.
Keep in mind these fees vary for Singaporeans and international students, as with universities 'round the world.
